languages.text: "Процентное соотношение боевых задач, выполненных и проваленных войсками данного мира, говорит об их недостаточной эффективности. Я буду рекомендовать местному правителю обратиться за помощью к моему братству и модернизировать свои войска до сервиторных манипул".

"The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."
languages.original_text: "Процентное соотношение боевых задач, выполненных и проваленных войсками данного мира, говорит об их недостаточной эффективности. Я буду рекомендовать местному правителю обратиться за помощью к моему братству и модернизировать свои войска до сервиторных манипул".

traits.locale_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objective completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to Servitor Maniples."

languages.text: "Die Erfolgsquote des hiesigen Militärs, was die Erreichung von Kampfzielen angeht, spricht für seine unterdurchschnittliche Effizienz. Ich werde dem örtlichen Herrscher empfehlen, die Hilfe meiner Bruderschaft anzunehmen, um seine Truppen zu Servitormanipeln upzugraden."
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erfolgsquote des hiesigen Militärs, was die Erreichung von Kampfzielen angeht, spricht für seine unterdurchschnittliche Effizienz. Ich werde dem örtlichen Herrscher empfehlen, die Hilfe meiner Bruderschaft anzunehmen, um seine Truppen zu Servitormanipeln upzugraden."

languages.text: « Le pourcentage d'échecs de l'armée de ce monde dans l'accomplissement de ses objectifs de combat témoigne de sa médiocre efficacité. Je vais conseiller au dirigeant local de solliciter l'aide de ma confrérie pour transformer ses troupes en manipules de servitors. »
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: « Le pourcentage d'échecs de l'armée de ce monde dans l'accomplissement de ses objectifs de combat témoigne de sa médiocre efficacité. Je vais conseiller au dirigeant local de solliciter l'aide de ma confrérie pour transformer ses troupes en manipules de servitors. »

languages.text: “这个世界作战目标的成功次数与失败次数的比值，表明这个世界的军队效率极其低下。我会建议当地的统治者向我的修会寻求帮助，将他们的部队升级为机仆军队。”
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: “这个世界作战目标的成功次数与失败次数的比值，表明这个世界的军队效率极其低下。我会建议当地的统治者向我的修会寻求帮助，将他们的部队升级为奴工军队。”

languages.text: 「この星の軍事的な目標達成の成功率が、効率の悪さを示している。自分は現地の統治者に、部隊をサーヴィター・マニプルにアップグレードするよう、我が団体の支援を求めるよう進言しよう」
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: 「この星の軍事的な目標達成の成功率は、その効率の悪さを示している。私は地元の統治者に、部隊をサーヴィター・マニプルにアップグレードするよう、我が団体の支援を求めるよう進言しよう」

languages.text: «La relación éxito-fracaso a la hora de cumplir los objetivos de combate de los militares de este mundo habla de su escasa eficacia. Aconsejaré al gobernante local que solicite la ayuda de mi hermandad para mejorar sus tropas a manípulos servidores».
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: «La relación éxito-fracaso a la hora de cumplir los objetivos de combate de los militares de este mundo habla de su escasa eficacia. Aconsejaré al gobernante local que solicite la ayuda de mi hermandad para mejorar sus tropas a manípulos servidores».

languages.text: "Bu dünyadaki askerlerin çatışma hedeflerini tamamlamadaki başarısızlık oranı, vasat altı verimliliklerine delalet. Yerel yöneticiye, birliklerini hizmetöre terfi ettirmek için kardeşliğimden yardım istemesini salık vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "The success-to-failure ratio of combat objectives completion for this world's military speaks to its subpar efficiency. I will advise the local ruler to seek my fraternity's aid in upgrading their troops to servitor maniples."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyadaki askerlerin çatışma hedeflerini tamamlamadaki başarısızlık oranı, vasat altı verimliliklerine delalet. Yerel yöneticiye, birliklerini servitöre terfi ettirmek için kardeşliğimden yardım istemesini salık vereceğim."
